item.title: Install and config Sway
item.description: Sway is very smooth but unstable compare to X11 DE like xfce4. Sometimes clash when high CPU usage, and not react to key events. And incompatible with native X11 applications, use them through XWayland. Install 1 2 3 4 sudo pacman -S sway swaybg swayidle swaylock xorg-xwayland \ xorg-xlsclients qt5-wayland glfw-wayland sudo pacman -S waybar wofi kanshi grim # optional Shell scripts ~/Shell/ screenshot.sh 1 2 #!/bin/sh grim -g "$(slurp)" "$HOME/Pictures/$(date +'Screenshot_%F_%T').

item.title: Build Blog on github pages
item.description: May 2022 reinstalled OS forgot to backup blog and lost all data, so i remove former articles except this Install hugo pacman -S hugo or download from https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases Initialization and replace theme 1 2 3 4 hugo new site {Blog} cd Blog git clone https://github.com/olOwOlo/hugo-theme-even themes/even cp -r ~/Blog/themes/even/exampleSite/* ~/Blog modify ~/Blog/config.toml Test 1 cd ~/Blog && hugo server Publish 1 cd ~/Blog && hugo will generate static files in public, then push them to github
